hero.subhead: Each Kastis KR Series is stripped to bare metal, re-engineered from the ground up, and hand-built in our Kaunas workshop to a standard the factory never imagined.

credo.title: The Method
lines: Every vehicle begins as a complete strip-down — chassis bare, identity erased — then rebuilt to documented torque values and photographed assembly stages.
We do not batch-produce. One vehicle, one team, start to finish. Metalwork, paint, mechanical, and trim under a single roof in Kaunas.
The result is a machine that looks period-correct at a glance but reveals its true nature the moment you drive it.
